title: New Patch Messed With Game Setting Default (Help)
body: Hey there fellow {{champion:27}} {{champion:62}} 's... So after the most recent patch, 7.18, every time the game boots, even if I change the settings - I am forced into window mode, and when I apply/save settings, the next game I get into, it will be as if that never happened. Although a minor nuisance, a nuisance nonetheless that hadn't occurred to me in all my time of playing league. So the question is.. what do?

replies.body:
Sounds like your settings are corrupt, but no worries!  Resetting your config should fix this up:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

It actually resolved itself on its own strangely without any client integrity file reparation.  Although if anyone should experience the same thing, I'll point them in the direction of the ones you gave me. Thanks.
